title: Agent T3: d'Artagnan
description: She lost her memory.He lost everything.Together, they need to find a way to save the world.d’Artagnan (Dar) Naylor: trained by the best, disciplined by the toughest, and raised by the vilest – his father. He bought into his family’s life of crime, until he learned the reasons behind it.Now, he possesses enhancements installed by The D.I.R.E. Agency – an organization he once called enemy. He has to stop the traitors from the past before they destroy the future.Jocelyn Chalmers wakes up in the future without a memory. All she’s certain of is the fear in her gut and her blinding attraction to gorgeous, protective D.I.R.E. agent, d’Artagnan Naylor.When close quarters prove too much for their passionate hunger, Dar knows his future is destined for hard decisions. Once Jocelyn’s memory is restored, she begs Dar to return to the past and save the world.Yet, to change the past, changed the future. How can they be certain of the consequences of his actions? How can he return her to the past where she belongs after all they’ve shared?Turbulent times come to a head when the past sends its own destruction to the future amidst long-awaited retribution.Can Dar escape his past to save the future? Or, does fate have its own reckoning in mind?
author: Joni Hahn
